trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Anniston
There were no other sightings in Anniston on or around January 29th 2011
divs: sighting detailsmy husband and i were out in our back yard looking for one of our cats and i asked him what is that i thought it was a flare gun. it was an orange glow round circle, it scared us at first but i said it must be an ufo! i really think it was! but it just started moving and we watched the 2 move through the sky slow at first and then they started a little faster and then the second one just went away and i asked my husand were did that one go and then the first one faded away too. this is our first time ever seeing anything like this, very interesting! can you please give me any info of what we saw? i do belive anything is possible! thanks, *(wit's name deleted--cms\sg).
